params.authedSigner_: The authorized signer to sign all the authed signature ! Requirements: ! Input authedSigner_ must not be an empty address * Operations: * Initialize the _authSigner variable

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

purchaseItems(uint256,address,uint256,ui.details: User purchase item with an authed signature with either base ether or erc20 token

params.billId_: The bill id which user would like to pay for
params.nonce_: The user nonce for the purchase
params.payment_: The payment amount the user need to pay
params.sigExpireBlockNum_: The block number where the signature will be expired if excced it
params.sig_: The authorized signature signed by _authedSigner ! Requirements: ! The user nonce must pass the validation of nonceGuard ! The signature must pass the validation of signatureGuard ! The msg.value must equal or greater than the payment value * Operations: * Emit a purchase item event
params.tokenAddress_: The token address which the user need to pay in, if address(0) means paying with base ether

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAuthedSigner(address).details: [Metadata]: Set the authed signer ! Requirements: ! The caller must be the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Withdraw base ether from the contract balance

params.amount_: The withdrawal amount ! Requirements: ! The caller must be the owner ! The the withdraw call must be success
params.recipient_: The recepient address where the ether would like to be withdrawed to

withdrawEther(address,uint256).details: Withdraw base ether from the contract balance

params.amount_: The withdrawal amount ! Requirements: ! The caller must be the owner ! The the withdraw call must be success
params.recipient_: The recepient address where the ether would like to be withdrawed to
